plot: While filming a poorly scripted, low budget zombie film in the woods, a group of YouTubers are attacked by real zombies. Will they survive the zombie apocalypse and what will they sacrifice along the way?
title: Super Brainy Zombies
plot_es: While filming a poorly scripted, low budget zombie film in the woods, a group of YouTubers are attacked by real zombies. Will they survive the zombie apocalypse and what will they sacrifice along the way?
plot_en: While filming a poorly scripted, low budget zombie film in the woods, a group of YouTubers are attacked by real zombies. Will they survive the zombie apocalypse and what will they sacrifice along the way?
